task.title: How to Change Brita Filter
task.shortdesc: Change the filter in a Brita pitcher.

context.p: Javier needs to take care himself, and part of that involves making sure he has fresh, purified water.

step.cmd: Take out old, used filter from Brita pitcher and throw away
Rinse filter under running water for 15 seconds to release the essential components inside that will eventually filter water
Insert filter into grooves of pitcher
Toss out water from next three pitchers-full of water

info.note: These first three pitchers will contain carbon and other particles from packaging, so do not drink this water.
